attributes.review: i downloaded this app hoping to get more information about trump and he‚Äôs ways of trying to make america ‚Äúgreat‚Äù again. when i gave the app my information they immediately started spamming me and calling me about me voting. bc they were doing so my phone started over heating and burning my hands(i now have 3rd degree burns all over my hands) and as i threw my phone bc it was too hot it blew up. the explosion was so big it blew up my entire house. me and my family are now homeless and i am doing this from my nurses sons ds. we are using the nurses son ds bc we are all in the hospital due to the explosion and my parents are barely hanging on. don‚Äôt download this app‚ú®
attributes.title: i am in the hospital

attributes.review: as a trump supporter, i downloaded the app to keep up with donald. i willingly entered my phone number. That night i got many strange emails and phone calls. and the next day i went out shopping and my credit cards all got declined. i checked my account and my account was empty. i got more phone calls and some of my emails held all of my bank account information!! PLEASE DONT GET THIS APP UNLESS YOU WANT YOUR CREDIT CARD INFO STOLEN!!!!
attributes.title: IT STOLE MY CREDIT CARD INFO
